reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was just ok. The staff were fairly unhelpful
reviews.title: Ok for RS1000

reviews.text: The rooms were clean but a little shabby and small. The hotel was on the main road so road noise and dogs barking a real problem here. Beds were not very comfortable either.
reviews.title: Great value for money, excellent service, best place to stay for the mid range traveller.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restuarant was highly recommended but i didn't think it was up to much.
reviews.title: dirty and dishonest

reviews.text: Though not very roomy, the classic a/c double room was clean, service was fast and excellent, food was good, staff was friendly and obliging. Real good value for money. I recommend this hotel to mid range travellers who find hotels like sinclairs or cinderella expensive. I will surely go back there again.
reviews.title: Clean, modern hotel in Siliguri

likes.disliked: — It was a little noisy from street traffic
